message.content:
cs.SE, cs.CR, cs.PL, cs.SY, cs.DC 

The paper discusses a framework for Solidity contract monitoring, instrumenting, and code generation, which falls under the software engineering (cs.SE) category. The paper also discusses analysis of vulnerabilities in smart contracts (cs.CR), and the framework provides support for building source level techniques for analysis, bug detection, coverage measurement, optimisations and code generation (cs.PL). The framework can be used for executing, verifying and enforcing credible transactions on permissionless blockchains (cs.SY), and the paper discusses techniques for analysis, instrumentation, optimisation and code generation of Solidity contracts (cs.DC).
